Package controller.observer

Interface UserObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Header, UserSettingsPanel
public interface UserObserver
Author:
ikojic000 UserObserver is an interface that represents an observer in the observer design pattern. It contains two methods for updating the observer when the user's profile photo or user information changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateProfilePhoto(User loggedInUser)
    Updates the observer with the latest profile photo of the logged-in user.
    void
    updateUserInfo(User loggedInUser)
    Updates the observer with the latest information of the logged-in user.

  • Method Details

    • updateProfilePhoto

      void updateProfilePhoto(User loggedInUser)
      Updates the observer with the latest profile photo of the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - the user whose profile photo has changed

    • updateUserInfo

      void updateUserInfo(User loggedInUser)
      Updates the observer with the latest information of the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - the user whose information has changed
